name: Information
text: Did you know? Kepler-452b is often referred to as Earth's 'cousin'!

name: Information
text: It is classified as a Super-Earth!

name: Information
text: Kepler-452b has a radius about 1.63 times that of Earth.

name: Information
text: It orbits its star in the habitable zone, this region allows for the possibility of liquid water

name: Information
text: The planet's gravity is estimated to be 18.63 m/sÂ²
